dt: {bc}the condition of having physical or mental control markedly diminished by the effects of alcohol or drugs

dt.t: The mere knowledge that they are on an island, a little world entirely surrounded by the sea, fills them with an indescribable {wi}intoxication{/wi} …

dt: {bc}an abnormal state that is essentially a poisoning

shortdef: the condition of having physical or mental control markedly diminished by the effects of alcohol or drugs
an abnormal state that is essentially a poisoning
